        Parameters:
        x - coordinate x
        y - coordinate y
        sprite - sprite Waka image (original face left)
        MapObjects - MapObjects Objects which could not move in the game.
        GameOriData - GameOriData the game original data read from json file.
        ImgMap - ImgMap the list with all image use in the game in it.

      • radar

        public void radar()
        Radar keep tracking the aound block set wheather the block is reachable.
        The radar for waka is a bit different than ghost.
        Cause if controled by user, so when user change it direction up or down, lefe right cannot move untill next node check. when user change it direction left or rignt, up down cannot move untill next node check.

      • checkMoveable

      • move

        public void move()
        Simple move method wich image change for waka.
        Waka show different picture with different direction.
        Specified by:
        move in class MoveObject

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Main logic of waka, run when waka alive.
        Change to img wakaclose every 8 frame.
        Check if just pass a node, if so, radar on.
        The radar set up which direction is moveable.
        The checMOveable check the user input direction whether moveable.
        If in Frighten mode or Soda mode, count time.
        Specified by:
        tick in interface GameInterface
        Overrides:
        tick in class GameObjects
